title: Derailed
description: She’s sworn off boys.He doesn’t have time for a girlfriend.The last thing they want is each other.DERAILEDHalston Greene’s crushes are legendary. Epic. But once she's made them hers—in a blink—she's sprinting for the nearest exit like her hair is on fire. When she suddenly finds herself once again miserably alone, she decides to take measures to protect herself…from herself. Her senior year will NOT be a loop of relationship lather, rinse, repeat.Tae Lee is the Korean transfer student from Georgia. His quest to earn valedictorian has been the one thing to spark light into his mother’s bleak life. But the competition at his new school is stiff and he’s coming in at the start of the last semester. He’s never been afraid of a challenge. He just didn’t expect it to look like a girl with a mane full of red curls and a kiss or kill attitude.Avoiding distraction is an art. Embracing it is disastrous. Derailed is the second book in the hilariously fun Dryden High Sweet Series by Randi Rigby.
author: Randi Rigby
